PageHeader-copyright: This is not a commercial project made for fans, the official website is here
Anime_Sequence-only-series-status: In this viewing order, only episodes have view statuses
Anime_Sequence-ranobe-suggestion: I highly recommend watching in that order, especially if this is your first time.
Anime_Sequence-anime-release-suggestion: This is the order of the episodes by their release date, i.e. how in what order they were released by the SHAFT studio, you can watch in this order, but I still recommend watching the light novel in order
Anime_Sequence-chronological-suggestion: I strongly do not recommend watching in this order, especially if this is your first time, you can watch in this order if you have watched Monogatari several times already.
Anime_Seguence-Bakemonogatari-descriptio: The first part of the Monogatari Series: First Season. Includes 15 supernatural episodes.
The premiere took place on July 3, 2009, the final episode aired on June 25, 2010.
I would like to write a lot of things here, but TOO MANY LETTERS, I will say briefly, and then just a small description of the beginning of the first series.

This title is tied to dialogues and a play on words, naturally in Japanese, no one can translate all the beauty of this play on words into any other language, therefore, in order to appreciate it 100%, you need to learn Japanese, you can of course find sites where when viewing a little these moments are explained (of course, I advise you to listen at least a little how it sounds in the original voice acting), but even without a full translation, this title is breathtaking and becomes a favorite for many people.
Anime_Seguence-Kizumonogatari-descriptio: The fourth part of the Monogatari Series: First Season. It has 3 insanely beautiful full-length films that will hurt you to the very heart, Iron Blood, Hot Blood, Cold Blood. In these full-length films, you will meet Kissshot-Acerola-Orion-Heart-Under-Blade Iron-Blooded, Hot-Blooded, Cold-Blooded Vampire and generally just a goddess.
And by the way, yes, there is no mistake, after the first part you need to watch the fourth part :)

The full-length films of the Kizumonogatari trilogy were released on screens with an interval of six months. The film Tekketsu-hen was released on January 8, 2016, the second film Nekketsu-hen was released on August 19, 2017, and the third film Reiketsu-hen was released on January 6, 2017.
Anime_Seguence-Nisemonogatari-descriptio: The second part of the Monogatari Series: First Season. It has 11 genuinely entertaining episodes.
The premiere took place on January 7, 2012, the final episode aired on March 17, 2012.
Anime_Seguence-Nekomonogatari-Kuro-descr: The third part of the Monogatari Series: First Season. Contains 4 episodes.
The premiere took place on December 31, 2012.
Anime_Seguence-Second-Season-description: Monogatari Series: Second Season is an entire season that includes:
Anime_Seguence-Second-Season-Nekomonogat: ⚬ Nekomonogatari (Shiro) Contains 5 episodes. The premiere took place on July 6, 2013, the final episode aired on August 3, 2013.
Anime_Seguence-Second-Season-Kabukimonog: ⚬ Kabukimonogatari Contains 4 episodes. The premiere took place on August 17, 2013, the final episode aired on September 7, 2013.
Anime_Seguence-Second-Season-Otorimonoga: ⚬ Otorimonogatari Contains 4 episodes. The premiere took place on September 21, 2013, the final episode aired on October 12, 2013.
Anime_Seguence-Second-Season-Onimonogata: ⚬ Onimonogatari Contains 4 episodes. The premiere took place on October 26, 2013, the final episode aired on November 16, 2013.
Anime_Seguence-Second-Season-Koimonogata: ⚬ Koimonogatari Contains 6 episodes. The premiere took place on November 23, 2013, the final episode aired on December 28, 2013.
Anime_Seguence-Second-Season-Hanamonogat: ⚬ Hanamonogatari Contains 5 episodes, which were later combined into one full-length movie. The premiere took place on August 16, 2014.
Anime_Seguence-Second-Season-description: But there is a small nuance here, I personally advise you to watch Monogatari Series: Second Season until the 9th series (9th series inclusive), go to Hanamonogatari, and continue to watch Monogatari Series: Second Season from the 10th series to the final 23- oh series (inclusive).
Anime_Seguence-Hanamonogatari-descriptio: The sixth part of the Monogatari Series: Second Season, contains 5 episodes, which were later combined into one full-length film.
The premiere took place on August 16, 2014.
You can watch both a series and a full-length movie at once.
Anime_Seguence-Second-Season-description: If you followed my advice and started watching after the 9th episode of Hanamonogatari, then now you can start watching Monogatari Series: Second Season from the 10th episode to the 23rd (inclusive)
If you did not watch the whole season at once, and then started watching Hanamonogatari, you can skip this step and move on to the next part.
Anime_Seguence-Tsukimonogatari-descripti: The first part of the Monogatari Series: Final Season, contains 4 episodes.
The premiere took place on December 31, 2014.
Anime_Seguence-Owarimonogatari-descripti: The second part of the Monogatari Series: Final Season contains 13 episodes.
The premiere took place on October 3, 2015, the final episode aired on December 20, 2015.
The first and second episodes of ''Ougi's Formula'' were released on TV screens as one hour-long episode, but were split on DVD and Blu-ray.
Anime_Seguence-Koyomimonogatari-descript: The third part of the Monogatari Series: Final Season, contains 12 episodes.
The premiere took place on January 9, 2016, the final episode aired on March 26, 2016.
Anime_Seguence-Owarimonogatari-II-descri: The fourth part of the Monogatari Series: Final Season, contains 7 episodes.
The premiere took place on August 12, 2017, the final episode aired on August 13, 2017.
Anime_Seguence-Zoku-Owarimonogatari-desc: The fifth part of the Monogatari Series: Final Season, contains 6 episodes.
The premiere took place on November 10, 2018.
Useful_links-Google-Docs-description: - Google doc with tons of information about Monogatari
Useful_links-Reddit-description: - A Reddit thread with all sorts of prescriptions and a lot of useful stuff
Useful_links-check-chronology-windows-ap: - A Windows application that I found on github, it is used to view the timeline and mark what has already been viewed
Useful_links-beautiful-site-description-: - A very beautiful site created by this
, if you have an account on github, then put an star to the person, because the work is very well done
Useful_links-telegram-channel-with-monog: - Telegram channel of a very good person, Monogatari and other works of Nisio Ishin often slip on the channel
Useful_links-telegram-monogatari-fandom-: - Telegram fandom, where news, fanarts, and a lot of useful things about Monogatari are published
Suggestion-title: Do you like this Monogatari Series Guide ?
Suggestion-description: If you have ideas, suggestions, advice, or you can help the project by giving some material - write to telegram. If you see an error in the material, you can also write in telegram.
Suggestion-communication-methods: We can connect on any of these platforms.
RegisterPage-password-length: password must contain at least 8 characters
RegisterPage-register-easy-steps: Registration in just a few easy steps
RegisterPage-register-basic-data: Registration requires basic data such as:
RegisterPage-card-status-viewed: Status of series/chapters (not viewed, I will watch, I watch, viewed) (work on this has not yet begun)
RegisterPage-card-add-certain: Add certain series/seasons/chapters to 'favorites' (work on this has not yet begun)
RegisterPage-card-comments: Ability to leave comments on series, chapters (work on this has not yet begun)
RegisterPage-card-chat: Chat/forum chat (work on this hasn't started yet)
RegisterPage-card-newsletter: Receive newsletter (maybe / not started working on this yet)
RegisterPage-card-send-media: Send media content to the suggestion, for the gallery (maybe / not started working on this yet)
RegisterPage-section-1-description: By registering, you can get some very handy features that will definitely help you in watching/reading the Monogatari Series. Our service is non-commercial, so you do not need to pay anything, you need a minimum amount of information in order to save your watched or favorite series / seasons.
RegisterPage-section-2-description: This will clearly show the profile goodies that you will receive after registration, these will be your checkpoints, favorite series / seasons, newsletter notifications, the ability to download media files related to the Story Cycle (maybe I have not started working on this yet), etc. .
